name: Night of The Demon
description:
In a world ravaged by demons, you must wield the power of the mythical rune sword "Gapaldur" to defend your home and save the captured children from the Damned. 

Team:

Michael Zatlin Jr: Programming, Game Design
Erro Greenwood: Art, Story-boarding
Digic300: Art, Animation
Flalcon: Sound Design, Music
